function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of global leadership in coordinating a response to the crisis","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases, lack of unified efforts for containment","Mitigation":"Convene a global deliberative forum, establish coordinated response strategies","Technologies":"Communication and collaboration tools for virtual forums","People":"Global population, international organizations","Owner":"United Nations, world leaders"},{"Description":"Ineffective regulation of supply chains and global corporations","Impact":"Risk of contaminated products, difficulty in controlling the spread of diseases through goods","Mitigation":"Implement effective regulations, enhance monitoring of supply chains","Technologies":"Blockchain for transparent supply chain management","People":"Manufacturers, government regulatory bodies","Owner":"Government regulatory bodies, international trade organizations"},{"Description":"Rebuilding public healthcare infrastructure","Impact":"Inadequate response to healthcare needs, increased risk of healthcare-associated infections","Mitigation":"Invest in infrastructure, improve healthcare facilities and resources","Technologies":"Healthcare management systems, telemedicine solutions","People":"Healthcare professionals, patients","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"}]}
